sentences.en: Construct a set of rectangular axes and resolve any inclined forces into rectangular components.
sentences.cn: 作一组直角坐标轴,把各力都分解成正交分量.

sentences.en: Every citizen has the duty to construct his country.
sentences.cn: 每个公民都有建设祖国的责任.

sentences.en: Henry decided he would construct this monument to himself and raise the money for it.
sentences.cn: 亨利决定要为他自己树立这个纪念碑,并为此而筹集资金.

sentences.en: How many man - days will be needed to construct this irrigation canal?
sentences.cn: 修这条渠道要多少人工?

sentences.en: I can construct bridges which are very light and strong and very portable.
sentences.cn: 我能建造轻便、坚固、搬运便利的桥梁.

sentences.en: It is proverbially easier to destroy than to construct.
sentences.cn: 谁都知道破坏容易建设难.

sentences.en: It is required to construct an access bridge over a motorway.
sentences.cn: 要求跨过公路建造一座跨线桥.

sentences.en: It is simple to construct in moderate sizes.
sentences.cn: 很容易把它建造成中等尺寸.

sentences.en: Now they can construct tunnel systems without hindrance.
sentences.cn: 现在他们可以顺利地建造隧道系统了.

sentences.en: One way to construct this line is by least square, weighting all points equally.
sentences.cn: 办法之一是给予所有的点子以相等的权用最小二乘方法来画这条线.

sentences.en: The sidereal year is not used to construct a calendar.
sentences.cn: 恒星年不用于编制年历.

sentences.en: The variety of airborne is so great that it is difficult to construct tidy classifications.
sentences.cn: 气载的种类是如此之多,以致于很难作出严整的分类.

sentences.en: There are a number of ways in which one can construct a triplet code.
sentences.cn: 建立三联体密码可以有几种不同方式.

sentences.en: There are plans to construct a new road bridge across the river.
sentences.cn: 有计划要建造一条新的跨河公路桥。

sentences.en: This fact provides us with the clue we need to construct a theory of the atom.
sentences.cn: 这个事实为形成一种原子理论提供了我们需要的线索.

sentences.en: We can construct the following sequence of identities.
sentences.cn: 我们能够得到下列一系列恒等式.

words.tran_cn: 建设性的；推定的；构造上的；有助益的
构造函数；构造器；建造者

trans.tran_en: an idea formed by combining several pieces of information or knowledge
to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc
to build something such as a house, bridge, road etc
